data.lyric:
[ti:Monsters(feat. Demi Lovato and blackbear) (Explicit)]
[ar:All Time Low/Demi Lovato/blackbear]
[al:Monsters (feat. Demi Lovato and blackbear) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Monsters (feat. Demi Lovato and blackbear) (Explicit) - All Time Low/Demi Lovato (黛米·洛瓦托)/blackbear
[00:00.35]Lyrics by：Alex Gaskarth/Jack Barakat/Andrew Goldstein/Kevin Fisher/Matthew Musto/Demi Lovato
[00:00.70]Why do all the monsters come out at night
[00:04.15]Why do we sleep where we want to hide
[00:07.11]Why do I run back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[00:11.94]
[00:15.65]Another day 'nother headache in this hangover hotel
[00:20.57]
[00:21.52]Gettin' used to the rhythm yeah I know this beat too well
[00:26.35]
[00:27.35]Tunnel visions got me feeling like you're the only one I see
[00:32.44]But I know what's missing when I'm swimmin'
[00:35.74]In my lonely luxury
[00:38.01]I'm wondering why do all the monsters come out at night
[00:42.56]Why do we sleep where we want to hide
[00:45.65]Why do I run back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[00:50.93]Why am I a sucker for all your lies
[00:54.44]Strung out like laundry on every line
[00:57.51]Why do I come back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[01:02.44]I'm addicted to the way you hurt the way you contradict me
[01:05.40]I swear everything look worse at night I think I'm overthinking
[01:08.39]I don't care who I might hurt along the way I'm f**kin' sinking
[01:11.23]Into every word I don't care if you're lyin' when I'm drinking
[01:14.14]So tell me pretty lies look me in my face
[01:17.54]Tell me that you love me even if it's fake
[01:20.57]You can lead me on and leave these questions in my sheets
[01:22.99]I'm under it I made my bed and I'm still wonderin'
[01:25.66]I'm wondering why do all the monsters come out at night
[01:30.03]Why do we sleep where we want to hide
[01:33.15]Why do I run back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[01:38.27]Why am I a sucker for all your lies
[01:41.84]Strung out like laundry on every line
[01:44.91]Why do I come back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[01:49.92]
[01:50.83]Thinkin' about you you're in my head
[01:53.75]Even without you I still feel dead
[01:56.87]Why do I run back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[02:01.93]Dead thinking about you you're in my head
[02:05.57]Even without you I still feel dead
[02:08.67]Why do I run back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[02:13.65]
[02:15.73]I'm wondering why do all the monsters come out at night
[02:20.53]Why do we sleep where we want to hide
[02:23.45]Why do I run back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[02:28.69]Why am I a sucker for all your lies
[02:32.24]Strung out like laundry on every line
[02:35.21]Why do I come back to you like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
[02:43.78]
[02:45.84]Yeah yeah
[02:49.02]Like I don't mind if you f**k up my life
data.trans:
[ti:Monsters(feat. Demi Lovato and blackbear) (Explicit)]
[ar:All Time Low/Demi Lovato/blackbear]
[al:Monsters (feat. Demi Lovato and blackbear) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.35]//
[00:00.70]为什么所有的怪兽都在夜间出没
[00:04.15]为什么每当我们想隐藏自己的时候 都会选择沉睡
[00:07.11]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[00:11.94]
[00:15.65]又是新的一天 又是宿醉之后头疼的感觉 躺在在这个旅馆里
[00:20.57]
[00:21.52]早就习惯了这个节奏 我太熟悉这首歌了
[00:26.35]
[00:27.35]狭窄的视线让我产生错觉 以为你就是我的唯一
[00:32.44]但我很清楚 徜徉在孤独的海洋里 
[00:35.74]我最需要的是什么
[00:38.01]我总是在想 为什么所有的怪兽都在夜间出没
[00:42.56]为什么每当我们想隐藏自己的时候 都会选择沉睡
[00:45.65]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[00:50.93]为什么我会相信你的所有谎言
[00:54.44]我感到迷茫无助
[00:57.51]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[01:02.44]我喜欢你伤害我的感觉 你反驳我的感觉
[01:05.40]夜深人静的时候 一切好像变得更糟了 希望是我多虑了
[01:08.39]沉溺在你的甜言蜜语里 我才不管是否会伤害到其他人
[01:11.23]当我喝醉的时候 我才不管你是否在说谎
[01:14.14]看着我 再对我说一些善意的谎言吧
[01:17.54]告诉我你还爱我 就算是骗我的也无所谓
[01:20.57]你可以继续欺骗我 把所有的疑问都留给我
[01:22.99]我彻底陷进去了 整理好床铺之后 依旧在思考着答案
[01:25.66]我总是在想 为什么所有的怪兽都在夜间出没
[01:30.03]为什么每当我们想隐藏自己的时候 都会选择沉睡
[01:33.15]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[01:38.27]为什么我会相信你的所有谎言
[01:41.84]我感到迷茫无助
[01:44.91]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[01:49.92]
[01:50.83]无时无刻不在想你 你在我的脑海里挥之不去
[01:53.75]但是没有你 我还是活得像行尸走肉
[01:56.87]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[02:01.93]就像行尸走肉 无时无刻不在想你 你在我的脑海里挥之不去
[02:05.57]但是没有你 我还是活得像行尸走肉
[02:08.67]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[02:13.65]
[02:15.73]我总是在想 为什么所有的怪兽都在夜间出没
[02:20.53]为什么每当我们想隐藏自己的时候 都会选择沉睡
[02:23.45]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[02:28.69]为什么我会相信你的所有谎言
[02:32.24]我感到迷茫无助
[02:35.21]即使你会毁掉我的人生 为什么我还是装作无所谓的样子 选择回到你身边
[02:43.78]
[02:45.84]//
[02:49.02]即使你会毁掉我的人生 我还是装作无所谓的样子
